overview: These women believe in the sanctity of marriage . . . for other people.  Lexi Luna - She must've had her fingers crossed when she said her vows!  Ariella Ferrera - This trophy wife is rewarding other men when her husband isn't around!  Bridgette B. - If your wife has a body like this, you'd better expect her to cheat!  Brooke Beretta - Hubby may have paid for those tits but her side piece gets to enjoy them!
title: A Married Woman 4
